transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Haan ji. Harjit se baat ho rahi hai sir Mahadev Engineering se?
Customer: Haan main bol raha hoon.
Executive: Haan ji very good morning sir main Deepak baat kar raha hoon IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haan ji Deepak ji.
Executive: Aah sir ye yahan pe ek 99 number se call aaya tha hamare customer care helpline pe.
Customer: Haan ji aapne kiya tha. Haan.
Executive: Haan haan haan. Aah wo profile mein kuch mobile number vagera update karwana tha to usi ke regarding main call kar raha tha.
Customer: Haan kar do koi nahi.
Executive: Sir aapke side se hi hoga sir.
Customer: Meri side se hoga?
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm hmm.
Customer: To phir main karwa lunga koi baat nahi.
Executive: To main guide unka number de dijiye main unhi ko directly call karke main unko guide kar deta hoon. Kis number pe hai?
Customer: Main keh raha hoon unka number de dijiye main unhe. Sare sare 8000 rupaye. Haan? Wapsi do.
Customer: Abe bhai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to update mobile number in profile.

- Customer asking for refund of ₹8000.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to guide with profile update.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved.

- None



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Angry



@@@Key Topics:

- profile update, refund, customer care
